assignments.name: Inventory Management System
assignments.description: A system to manage inventory of a store. It should be able to add, update, delete and search for items in the inventory. It should also be able to generate reports on the inventory.

assignments.name: Hotel Reservation System
assignments.description: A system to manage hotel reservations. It should be able to add, update, delete and search for reservations. It should also be able to generate reports on the reservations.

assignments.name: Airline Reservation System
assignments.description: A system to manage airline reservations. It should be able to add, update, delete and search for reservations. It should also be able to generate reports on the reservations.
